response.overview: Film director Wolfgang Petersen will explain the concept behind the film Troy, which was not easy due to the lack of evidence on the subject. The data for the most accurate creation of the mythical city of Troy was taken from the best-preserved sources in the English Museum. The effort to create the city as realistic as possible, which was supposed to sound pompous and magnificent, thanks to the elaborate constructions and vastness, is also mentioned here in this short behind the scenes feature.
response.title: Troy From Ruins to Reality
